SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
This class serves as the central controller for the application, managing navigation between different views and coordinating actions across the entire program.

    • setProvableKeyBatchForSignatureProcesses

      public void setProvableKeyBatchForSignatureProcesses(String privateKeyBatch, String publicKeyBatch, boolean isKeyForComparisonMode, boolean isKeyForCustomComparisonMode)
      Sets the batch of private and public keys for both signature creation and verification processes. This method is crucial for handling the application's functionality in different modes, specifically in comparison and custom comparison benchmarking modes. It delegates the process of setting keys for the signature creation and verification controllers, allowing these controllers to operate with the specified keys.

      In comparison mode, this method helps in setting up the environment for comparing the standard vs provably secure parameters. In custom comparison mode, it facilitates a more granular and detailed analysis with arbitrary user provided key configurations.

      Parameters:
      privateKeyBatch - The batch of private keys used in the signature creation process.
      publicKeyBatch - The batch of public keys used in the signature verification process.
      isKeyForComparisonMode - Indicates if the keys are used in comparison mode, enabling performance comparison.
      isKeyForCustomComparisonMode - Indicates if the keys are set for custom comparison mode, enabling detailed analysis with custom configurations.

    • setProvableKeyForSignatureProcesses

      public void setProvableKeyForSignatureProcesses(String privateKey, String publicKey)
      Sets the private/public key for signature verification/creation operations. This method is used to provide the signature controller with a provably secure generated (small e ) key pairing to allow for later instantiation of a signature scheme with provably secure parameters. The key pairing can be set in non-benchmarking mode.
      Parameters:
      privateKey - The private key to be used for signature creation.
      publicKey - The public key to be used for signature verification.

    • setKeyConfigurationStringsForComparisonMode

      public void setKeyConfigurationStringsForComparisonMode(List<String> keyConfigurationStringsForComparisonMode)
      Sets the list of key configuration strings for comparison mode across the signature controller assembly by providing configuration details of the keys used in the comparison benchmarking mode. The configuration strings represent different key configurations that are used to compare signature processes under different key settings.
      Parameters:
      keyConfigurationStringsForComparisonMode - A list of string representations of key configurations.

    • setKeyConfigToHashFunctionsMapForCustomComparisonMode

      public void setKeyConfigToHashFunctionsMapForCustomComparisonMode(Map<Integer,List<HashFunctionSelection>> keyConfigToHashFunctionsMap, int keyPerGroup)
      Sets the mapping of key configurations to hash functions for the custom comparison mode in signature creation and verification controllers. This method allows for specifying different hash functions for each group of key configurations.
      Parameters:
      keyConfigToHashFunctionsMap - The map linking each key configuration group to its hash function selections.
      keyPerGroup - The number of keys per group, determining how many keys are processed together.

    • showSignatureCreationStandard

      public void showSignatureCreationStandard()
      Displays the signature creation view in the standard mode with no benchmarking functionality.

    • showSignatureCreationComparisonBenchmarking

      public void showSignatureCreationComparisonBenchmarking()
      Displays the signature creation view for comparison benchmarking mode. This method updates the UI to present an interface tailored for comparing signature creation performance across different key configurations.

    • showSignatureVerificationComparisonBenchmarking

      public void showSignatureVerificationComparisonBenchmarking()
      Displays the signature verification view for comparison benchmarking mode. This method updates the UI to present an interface specifically designed for comparing signature verification performance across various key configurations.

    • showSignatureCreationBenchmarking

      public void showSignatureCreationBenchmarking()
      Displays the signature creation view in benchmarking mode. This method triggers the UI update to show the interface for signature creation with benchmarking functionalities.

    • showSignatureVerificationStandard

      public void showSignatureVerificationStandard()
      Displays the signature verification view in standard mode. This method updates the UI to present the interface for standard signature verification.

    • showSignatureVerificationBenchmarking

      public void showSignatureVerificationBenchmarking()
      Displays the signature verification view in benchmarking mode. This method updates the UI to present the interface for signature verification with benchmarking functionalities.

    • getSignatureCreationComparisonBenchmarkingImport

      Returns:
      A string representing the imported key batch

    • showGenViewStandard

    • showGenViewCrossBenchmarking

      public void showGenViewCrossBenchmarking()
      Displays the key generation view in cross parameter benchmarking mode. This method updates the UI to present the interface for benchmarking in comparison.

    • activateKeyGenCustomComparisonMode

      public void activateKeyGenCustomComparisonMode(GenView genView)
      Activates and configures the key generation controller for the custom comparison benchmarking mode. This method instantiates a new GenControllerComparisonBenchmarking controller with custom comparison logic and sets it as the current controller for comparison benchmarking operations in the key generation mediator.
      Parameters:
      genView - The GenView instance that provides the user interface elements for the benchmarking mode.

    • activateKeyGenComparisonMode

      public void activateKeyGenComparisonMode(GenView genView)
      Activates and configures the key generation controller for the comparison (provably secure vs standard) benchmarking mode. This method instantiates a new GenControllerComparisonBenchmarking controller with standard comparison logic and sets it as the current controller for comparison benchmarking operations in the key generation mediator.
      Parameters:
      genView - The GenView instance that provides the user interface elements for the benchmarking mode.
